long_description: Enjoy the fast-thinking fun of the Scattergories card game in a convenient and portable format! 2 decks form countless combinations of categories and letters to make each game unique. Scattergories card game includes 1 deck of letter cards, 1 deck of category cards, 2 "I Know" cards and rules.
short_description: Enjoy the fast-thinking fun of the Scattergories card game in a convenient and portable format! 2 decks form countless combinations of categories and letters to make each game unique.
